entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 10:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Becoming mainly cloudy late in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
